AuthForm.signInDescription: Sign in to continue to StudyTrack.
AuthForm.signUpDescription: Enter your email below to create your account.
AuthForm.emailRequired: Please enter a valid email address.
AuthForm.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters.

LandingPage.title: Unlock Your Learning Potential with StudyTrack
LandingPage.description: Your personal guide to effective learning. Track your study hours, manage projects, and get AI-powered tips to optimize your schedule.

AiStudyTips.title: AI Study Tips
AiStudyTips.description: Get personalized tips to optimize your study schedule based on your recent activity.

QualificationManager.title: Manage Projects
QualificationManager.description: Add, edit, or remove your projects and their descriptions.
QualificationManager.dialogDescription: Enter the name of the project and an optional description.
QualificationManager.descriptionPlaceholder: e.g., A project to launch a new website for a client.

RecentActivity.title: Recent Activity
RecentActivity.description: A log of your most recent study sessions.

StudyCharts.title: Study Progress
StudyCharts.description: Visualize your study habits over time.

StudyTimer.title: Study Timer
StudyTimer.description: Select a project and start the timer to log your study session.

RootLayout.title: StudyTrack
RootLayout.description: Your personal guide to effective learning.
